summary:
Central Park is a huge and famous park in Manhattan, New York. It's one of the oldest and most visited urban parks in the USA, covering 843 acres. The park was designed by Frederick Law Olmsted and Calvert Vaux in the 1850s, and it opened in 1858. It features beautiful landscapes, like the Ramble and Lake, and attractions such as the Central Park Zoo and the Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis Reservoir.

The park has a rich history, facing periods of decline and renovation. It's known for its diverse wildlife and offers many activities, including sports, concerts, and horse-drawn carriage rides. Central Park is a historic landmark and a must-see destination in New York City.
title: Central Park
